itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, June 24, 2013
title: Microsoft returns to San Francisco for developers conference
contentencoded:
Microsoft kicks off its developers conference, Microsoft Build, on Wednesday. It's a chance for the company to get app makers and others excited about making new software for its platform. Microsoft returns to San Francisco this year for the meeting, for the first time since 1997.

Pete Pachal, tech editor for Mashable, joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.

teaser: What to expect from Microsoft's developers conference, Microsoft Build.
